Name: Leander
Fate:
Transferred to Royal New Zealand Navy as HMNZS Leander 1941-1945
Broken up at Blyth 1950

Name: Neptune
Fate: Sunk in minefield off Tripoli, 19 December 1941

Name: Achilles
Fate:
Transferred to Royal New Zealand Navy as HMNZS Achilles 1941-1946
Sold to Indian Navy as HIMS Delhi 1948

Name: Amphion
Fate:
Sold to Royal Australian Navy as HMAS Perth, 1939
Sunk in torpedo attack, 1 March 1942

Name: Apollo
Fate:
Sold to Royal Australian Navy as HMAS Hobart, 1938
Broken up at Osaka, 1962
